The Puffin client app and the Puffin cloud server do not communicate in HTTP protocol and the data exchange is not in HTML format. The Puffin client app is like the remote desktop client and the Puffin cloud server is like the remote desktop server. Puffin Cloud Browser gives the audience the illusion of a web browser but it is not, in reality, a web browser. Puffin Cloud Browser can only "display" the web content rendered on the cloud servers but can't "render" the web content itself on the client devices.

==== Differentiating Features ====
* Browser Isolation
* Cloud Acceleration
* Data Saving
* Download to Cloud
* Flash Game
* Full Desktop Mode
* Internet Access Protection
* Virtual Gamepad/Mouse/Trackpad

==== Important Limitations ====
* Only works on websites that are publicly accessible from the US
  -- Does not work for private IP, corporate Intranet, and geo-restricted websites
* Only works in countries that are not excessive in censorship
  -- Does not work in China, Iran, Saudi Arabia, and United Arab Emirates

* For some websites, Puffin server IP blocks need to be white-listed
  -- Puffin can bring an excessive load to some websites

More info at Puffin FAQ https://help.puffin.com/faq

HOW TO INSTALL THE KEYBOARD:
1. Go to Settings > General > Keyboard > Keyboards
2. Add New Keyboard...
3. Choose KeySlator and enable Full Access*

*Rest assured, no data of any kind is stored or shared by KeySlator. Translations use network access for Google services, and are bound by their terms of service and privacy policy. This is machine translation, in order to be in real time, so don't expect perfect, native colloquialisms and diction as if it were from a native speaker! It is a great way to get your meaning across if you don't speak the language, and a different way to learn vocabulary!

● From your normal keyboard, press and hold the bottom left button (usually a globe or smiley), and select KeySlator from the list
● Once visible, choose the language you want to translate to by tapping the ... button
● Type anything, and tap the translation that shows up to replace your text
● If you want to "reverse translate" text, just copy it and it will show up translated just above the keyboard buttons, or double tab the blue button

Many web sites deliberately disable user interface features in Safari that you normally expect to work. StopTheMadness re-enables those features for you in Safari:
• opening contextual menus
• selecting, copying, cutting, and pasting of text
• drag and drop
• AutoFill/autocomplete of passwords, emails, etc.

StopTheMadness also protects your privacy on the web:
• Stops Google AMP (Accelerated Mobile Pages)! Automatically loads the original "canonical" web site page instead of Google AMP.
• Removes tracking tags such as utm_source, gclid, and fbclid from the end of URLs.
• Stops clickjacking in Google Search, Gmail, Facebook, and DuckDuckGo.
• Stops hyperlink auditing (anchor "ping").
• Stops tracking beacons (Navigator.sendBeacon).

• Stops URL shorteners. Checks the links you click in Safari for well-known link shorteners — bit.ly, tinyurl.com, l.facebook.com, t.co, etc. — and loads the unshortened destination URL instead of the shortened URL. This occurs without setting any cookies or other site data, so you can't be tracked by your click.
